attributes.action: Stop War - The Uk must stop this insatiable need to be constantly at war with someone.
attributes.additional_details:
This country appears to have an absolute need to be at war with some other country at all times.

This petition is to state to this Government and future Governments that war, aggression and violence is not a the only solution to problems.  It maybe that dialogue and therefore understanding would be more effeictive.  It would also reduce the number of reprisals comitted in this country.

This country is not the police man of the world, and it is wrong that the country should appoint itself to that role.
